name: Boing Up!
description:
Bounce your way to the top!

Stretch your ball, destroy the other balls, avoid the spikey balls, ligma balls, earn points, avoid various obstacles, survive boss battles, and become the ball master!

- 3 different areas, 6 unique abilities, and 75 skins to purchase

A hobby game made for fun and uploaded to this website for people to play and enjoy. Game mechanics are heavily inspired by Dani's mobile game named "Balls?". 

Assets used are taken from various sites on the internet and may be copyrighted. I added their links in the credit section but if there is still a problem please contact me so I can change or remove the game entirely.
